notes: Launches projectiles onto enemies within 450 radius. Can target invisible units and units inside the Fog of War.
Can target invisible units and units inside the Fog of War.
The projectiles travel at a speed of 1900.
Roots the targets, preventing them from moving and casting certain mobility abilities. Provides True Sight over affected targets.
Provides True Sight over affected targets.
Eternal Chains first applies the damage, then the debuff.
Successive casts on the same target do not stack but refresh the duration instead.
Shares cooldown with Rod of Atos-based items.
abilities.description: Roots all enemies in a target 450 radius for 2 seconds and deals 220 damage.

notes: When obtaining multiple items with the Chain Lightning ability, only the one that has been continuously the longest in the inventory works.

The lightning bounces in 0.25-second intervals, so hitting 4 targets takes 0.75 seconds. All bounces together can deal up to 640 damage (before reductions). Against a lone target, Chain Lightning adds an average of 48 magical damage to every attack.
All bounces together can deal up to 640 damage (before reductions).
Against a lone target, Chain Lightning adds an average of 48 magical damage to every attack.

Chain Lightning can proc while a previous Chain Lightning is still bouncing. Can never hit the same unit more than once per proc. Attacks which proc Chain Lightning cannot miss. Can proc on invisible units or units in Fog of War, but it does not bounce toward those units. Does not proc if the attacker is dead. However, it can proc if the target is dead. Chain Lightning uses pseudo-random distribution.
Can never hit the same unit more than once per proc.
Attacks which proc Chain Lightning cannot miss.
Can proc on invisible units or units in Fog of War, but it does not bounce toward those units.
Does not proc if the attacker is dead. However, it can proc if the target is dead.
Chain Lightning uses pseudo-random distribution.
The hidden modifier is a hidden buff required for the lightning to bounce.
Chain Lightning uses a custom cooldown system. It is neither displayed on the item icon when procced, nor is affected by cooldown manipulation.
abilities.description: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
14, 14 and 24 main attack damage to all / / heroes respectively.
name: Gleipnir
description: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.
trivia: In Norse Mythology, Gleipnir is the chain that is used to bind Fenrir, a wolf that is the son of Loki and Angrboda.
Gleipnir's intern name is "Gungir", an incorrect spelling of Gungnir, which is the spear of the Norse Mythology God Odin.
